did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: George Mason University. Libraries.Special Collections Research Center.

did.abstract: The collection consists of illustrations that appeared in Puck, Harper's Weekly, and Illustrated London News.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: George Mason University. Libraries. Special Collections Research Center.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: There are no restrictions on personal use. Permission to publish material from the 19th century newspaper illustrations collection must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, George Mason University Libraries.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: 19th century newspaper illustrations collection, C0285, Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processing completed by Jessica Lynn in 2016. EAD markup completed by Jordan Patty in 2016.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of illustrations that appeared in Puck, Harper's Weekly, and Illustrated London News. The illustrations from Puck are largely satirical in nature and the subject matter is Gilded Age politics. The subject matter of the Harper's Weekly and Illustrated London News focus on the Civil War and Mount Vernon, the home of George Washington.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Special Collections Research Center also holds the

Harper's Weekly - The Room in Which George Washington Died,
